title: (DOUBLE DAMAGE GAREN BUG) THE MOST OP CHAMPION IN URF MODE - LEAGUE OF LEGENDS

embed.description: 2016 urf mode double damage bugged garen. by spamming the e you become a bayblade and once you have become a bayblade you get 2x the damage on your e. this damage will be demonstated in the video.

replies.body:
I can't really tell if it is 2x damage or not, I think if you just use his E as normal it will still do the same damage, the difference being that you can cancel and restart his skill instantly therefore having a non stop E active at all times.

I can do the same with Eve, build Ravenous Hydra and spam QWE and my active when next to an enemy, they just die, instantly, and due to her low W CDR, she can pretty much always keep up.
i still think it is a bug because if this is possible in normals and ranked why isnt it being done? ill prob make a gameplay and post it here soon :)

It's not being done in normals/ranked because it *can't* be done in normals/ranked.

The reason for this is the 80% CDR which is *unique* to URF. Because of the drastically increased CDR Garen's "Judgement" can be cancelled for the "instant cooldown" only 0.2 seconds after it's cast. By spamming the E button (or whatever key the player has their third basic ability bound to) it's possible to gain as many as 5 ticks of damage per second, rather than the usual 2. *Note: I'm semi-confident it's 2 ticks per second after a quick Google search, however that may be inaccurate.*

It's *not* a bug because everything is working as it should. It could, however, be considered an exploit from a certain perspective.
hahah very true well my mistake i thought it was a bug from hearing it around. either way its still pretty strong :)
Not bad but still not the most OP. That URF title still belongs to Sona :)
